data.title: Full Utility A Site Hold Setup
data.description: Here's a very effective full utility A Site Hold Setup.

data.title: B Site Passive Full Utility Site Hold Setup
data.description: This is a great passive full utility Site hold setup, that allows you to hold the B Arcade cross, and catch players pushing into both of the most open chokepoints on B Site.

data.title: Full Utility B Tower Setup
data.description: This full utility setup gives you many options from within B Tower for how you can respond to attackers pushing into B.
